metadata.title: CVE-2023-52883 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix possible null pointer dereferenceabo->tbo.resource may be NULL in amdgpu_vm_bo_update.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
